# Test fixture to set up Turtle graphics environment before each test
@pytest.fixture
def turtle_setup():
    turtle.bgcolor('#fff')
turtle.colormode(255)
turtle.hideturtle()

# Use the fixture in a test case

    # Change turtle color and verify it
    assert turtle.pencolor() == (255, 0, 0)
    # Draw a square with custom color
turtle.pencolor((255, 0, 0))
turtle.forward(100)
turtle.right(90)
turtle.forward(100)
turtle.right(90)
turtle.forward(100)
turtle.right(90)
turtle.forward(100)

pymtest.main([__file__, '--fixtures', 'turtle_setup'])```
